creator: d-mcclean@ti.com
text:
If an email error occurs ( such as a bogus mailhost name), the error is not 
redirected to the fallback error appender if one is defined.

creator: yoavs@computer.org
text: Still seems true for 1.3-alpha3.  Errors are logged but not by the errorHandler.

creator: ceki@apache.org
text: Log4j is moving away from of the user of error handlers.

It does not make a lot of sense for SMTPAppender to have a fallback appender 
because SMTPAppender itself is lossy by design. Moreover, log4j is slowly moving 
away from generic error handlers.
creator: ceki@apache.org
